triples.name: Model Checking
triples.relevance: Core method being developed algorithmically for Markov automata verification

triples.name: Markov Automata
triples.relevance: The primary modeling formalism that spans discrete and continuous time Markov chains and probabilistic automata

triples.name: Discrete-time Markov chain
triples.relevance: A special case of Markov automata covered by the compositional formalism

triples.name: Continuous-time Markov chain
triples.relevance: A special case of Markov automata where state transitions occur continuously

triples.name: Probabilistic automaton
triples.relevance: A generalization of finite automata with probabilistic transitions that relates to Markov automata

triples.name: Probabilistic CTL
triples.relevance: A PCTL-like temporal logic for expressing probabilistic properties in model checking

triples.name: Temporal logic
triples.relevance: The formal language framework for expressing system properties alongside PCTL and CSL

triples.name: Reachability analysis
triples.relevance: Core algorithmic technique used for computing time-bounded reachability probabilities

triples.name: Markov chain
triples.relevance: Fundamental probabilistic model that Markov automata generalize and extend
